childProfileSelection.title: Select Your Profile
childProfileSelection.instruction: Select your profile to continue with your learning journey.
childProfileSelection.noProfilesMessage:
This device doesn't have any child profiles yet.
Please join a family first.

childPinLogin.instruction: Enter your PIN to continue learning.
childPinLogin.pinMinLength: PIN must be at least 4 digits
childPinLogin.forgotPin: Forgot your PIN? Ask your parent for help
childPinLogin.pinHelpStep1: Ask your parent to help you reset it
childPinLogin.pinHelpStep2: They can create a new join code for you
childPinLogin.pinHelpStep3: Then you can set up a new PIN
childPinLogin.pinHelpReminder: Remember: Your PIN should be something only you know!

parentPreRegistration.title: Create Family Account
parentPreRegistration.instructions: Let's set up your family account. First, we'll verify your email address with a confirmation code.
parentPreRegistration.verificationNotice: We'll send a 6-digit verification code to this email. Make sure you have access to it.

childJoin.title: Join Family
childJoin.instructions: Enter the 6-digit join code your parent shared with you to join your family account.
childJoin.joinCodeNumeric: Join code must contain only numbers
childJoin.helpMessage: Ask your parent to generate a join code from their Family Dashboard.

otpVerification.title: Verify Email
otpVerification.heading: Check Your Email
otpVerification.instructions: We sent a 6-digit verification code to your email

profileCompletion.title: Complete Profile
profileCompletion.heading: Almost Done!
profileCompletion.instructions: Complete your profile to create your family account and start your learning journey.
profileCompletion.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
profileCompletion.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

childPinSetup.title: Create Your PIN

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password?
forgotPassword.instruction: Enter your email address to receive a password reset link.
